  • Field Details

    • DEFAULT_FREQUENCY

      static final float DEFAULT_FREQUENCY
      We will assume a frequency of 1:100,000 if no frequency data is available.

      Note that the frequency is stored as a percentage.

      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values
